title: Scenario-Based Learning for Strengthening Complex Thinking Competencies Based on SDGs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and beginner-level awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: Trainees, as corporate managers/leaders, are required to solve SDGs-related problems in real work settings. Smartphone-based digital tools serve as primary learning supports

learning_goals: Learners can select three or more of the 17 SDGs and design scenarios applicable to real corporate environments.
Learners can write reports analyzing SDGs-linked social issues using a complex thinking model (systems thinking, critical thinking, creative thinking).
Learner teams can develop action plans for SDGs-based problem-solving and present outcomes through project presentations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
